ygData.msgSnippet: Beachcomber looked to the fuel line. Finally some progress, he thought to himself. Well, it dosent matter where your from, to any robot this is fatal. he

Subject: Re: Beachcomber and Redhot

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Beachcomber looked to the fuel line. Finally some progress, he thought
to himself. "Well, it dosent matter where your from, to any robot this
is fatal." he said, emitting a low power laser from one hand, as he held
the line to graft it into place. The superstructure could wait, but this
fuel pump and engine couldn't. He then went to the engine, grafting
damaged parts together, mostly doing as little as possible as not to
wreck anything.
